features: EFFORTLESS CLEANING IN ONE SWEEP: Patented wave technology catches over 99% of dust and dirt in one sweep*
DUAL-BRISTLE TECHNOLOGY: Features angled firm black bristles that thoroughly pull dirt from corners; and semi-soft grey bristles that capture and move dirt effectively
HANDS-FREE CLEANUP: The Step-On Dust Pan's cleaning combs remove 3X more hair and debris from the broom bristles, without having the touch the mess
NO MORE BENDING: Reduces bending while cleaning up debris and Dust Pan lip seals to the floor with foot pressure leaving no trace of dirt behind
BUILT TO LAST: Flare-tip Memory Bristles maintain their shape and performance after usage
SUSTAINABLE: Bristles are made from 80% recycled plastic for an ecofriendly choice
RELEASE DIRT IN ONE TAP: Anti-static technology releases dirt into trash with a single tap
*Removes over 99% of common household dust and dirt like long grain rice, sugar, hair and cereal in one sweep, as tested at an independent accredited lab.
body.description: Leave no dirt behind with the advanced design of O-Cedar’s One Sweep Broom with Step-On Dust Pan. Its patented wave-technology catches over 99% of dust and dirt in one sweep, and dual-bristle innovation provides superior sweeping compared to traditional brooms. Make cleaning faster and more efficient with its angled eco-friendly bristles that reach into tight corners, and hands-free cleanup with the easy-to-use step-on dust pan. *Removes over 99% of common household dust and dirt like long grain rice, sugar, hair and cereal in one sweep, as tested at an independent accredited lab.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for easy cleaning floors!
reviews.reviewText: The O-Cedar Pet Pro Broom has proven to be a game-changer in managing pet hair and keeping my living space clean. This broom's exceptional design and performance make it a standout choice for pet owners.The first impressive feature is the dual-action bristles. The combination of traditional bristles and rubber bristles works wonders in trapping and collecting pet hair efficiently. This dual-bristle technology is a true game-changer for anyone dealing with the challenge of keeping pet hair under control.The extendable handle is a thoughtful addition. It allows for customizable height adjustments, catering to users of different heights and preferences. This feature is particularly beneficial for preventing back strain during extended cleaning sessions. The sturdy build of the handle adds to the overall durability of the broom.The built-in squeegee edge is a multifunctional element that adds versatility to the Pet Pro Broom. It not only excels at gathering pet hair but also proves effective in handling spills and wet messes. This dual-purpose design makes it an efficient tool for various cleaning tasks around the house.The broom's lightweight construction doesn't compromise its effectiveness. Despite its ease of use and maneuverability, the O-Cedar Pet Pro Broom is surprisingly robust. It handles the rigors of regular use and continues to deliver consistent performance over time.Durability is a key strength of this broom. The quality metal materials used in its construction ensure that it withstands the wear and tear associated with frequent use in a pet-friendly household. The resilient bristles maintain their effectiveness even after prolonged use, offering lasting value.The user-friendly cleaning experience is further enhanced by the easy-to-clean design. Pet hair can be easily removed from the bristles, and the broom is a breeze to maintain. This practicality adds to the overall appeal, ensuring that the O-Cedar Pet Pro Broom remains a hassle-free and efficient cleaning solution.In conclusion, the O-Cedar Pet Pro Broom has become an essential tool in my cleaning arsenal. Its dual-action bristles, extendable handle, squeegee edge, lightweight design, and durability make it an exceptional choice for pet owners. If you're in search of a broom that tackles pet hair with ease and versatility, the O-Cedar Pet Pro Broom is a top-notch solution that brings efficiency and convenience to your cleaning routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient Cleaning for Every Corner
reviews.reviewText: The O-Cedar PowerCorner Angle Broom with Dustpan is a game-changer for household cleaning, and it has exceeded my expectations with its exceptional performance, innovative design, and convenience. This angle broom is the perfect cleaning tool for reaching every corner of your home with ease and efficiency.The standout feature of the O-Cedar PowerCorner Angle Broom is its unique shape, featuring bristles that are cut to an angle, allowing you to clean deep into corners and tight spaces effortlessly.The broom's bristles are made from high-quality materials, ensuring they effectively pick up dust, dirt, and debris, leaving your floors spotless.The sturdy construction of the broom's handle ensures it can handle rigorous cleaning tasks without bending or breaking, providing long-lasting durability.The included dustpan is perfectly designed to match the broom's angle, making it easy to sweep debris directly into the dustpan without leaving any mess behind.The compact size and lightweight design of the O-Cedar PowerCorner Angle Broom make it easy to maneuver and store, saving valuable space in your cleaning closet.O-Cedar is a trusted brand known for its reliable cleaning products, and the PowerCorner Angle Broom with Dustpan lives up to that reputation, offering a practical and efficient solution for your cleaning needs.In conclusion, the O-Cedar PowerCorner Angle Broom with Dustpan is a must-have for every household seeking a quick and effective cleaning solution. Its innovative design, efficient performance, and durable build make it the ultimate choice for reaching every corner of your home with ease. If you're looking for a top-notch angle broom to simplify your cleaning routine, the O-Cedar PowerCorner Angle Broom with Dustpan is the perfect option. I highly recommend this broom for its outstanding features and its ability to keep your floors sparkling clean in no time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best broom out there -- just get this!
reviews.reviewText: After trying a variety of booms and dustpans, even similar-looking brooms and dustpans from this same brand, I came back to buy this Pet Pro set for a second time. It's such a treat to use! It does an amazing job of getting the dust and pet hair off my hardwood floors. This broom and dustpan set is sturdy, easy to use, and most importantly, it works. It is so gratifying to see how much dust and pet hair it can gather -- I want to sweep every day!! Twice a day! The bristles are or various lengths, so they provide a broad range of contact with the floor and quite effective at collecting fine dust and debris. The dustpan is sturdy, wide, and creates an excellent seal with the floor. The dustpan has ridges, so that you can brush the broom through the ridges to get all of the pet hair off the broom and into the dust pan -- much nicer than having to pull out all of the fur by hand. The dust pan snaps securely onto the boom, so the two pieces are easily stored together. I suspect it sounds silly to be so excited about a broom and dustpan -- but these are different -- and superior to -- other brooms and dustpans I have used in the past. The dustpan is really a game changer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and compact. Works nicely on my hardwood floors
reviews.reviewText: I was about to buy a standard broom and dust box until I came across this one. The hand dustpan has the stepon handle allow it to works like a handled dustpan while making it more compact. The dustpan comb is a good feature but idk why it's only wide enough for the grey bristles and not the entire thing.The broom itself is good. The brush is soft enough to bend but still study enough, however, this softness really means that this is an indoor broom and not for rough outside terrian. Overall, a good quality indoor broom without the bulk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, yet effective.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together. Came in separate pieces but broom was sturdy once assembled. The dust pan can be used while standing and is an underrated feature.
I am so happy with this broom it picks up my pet hair so easy, just like it says.

reviews.reviewTitle: Então é assim que é uma vassoura
reviews.reviewText: Estou apaixonado e hoje vejo que as vassouras do brasil são somente cópias frágeis
Just what I needed and wanted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great broom for the price. Sweeps almost all the dust etc. Great for the stairs; being elderly I unscrewed the broom head and sitting on each step I could sweep the stair 2 rungs up. It does not, however, totally clean as the bristles are coarse and set apart so it can leave a slight residue. All in all though I would recommend this item, especially in partnership with a vacuum!
